posts.title: Getting Started with React
posts.content: React is a powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows you to create reusable components and manage state efficiently.
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: Understanding TypeScript
posts.content: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, helping you catch errors early and write more maintainable code. It's a great choice for large projects.
posts.author: Jane Smith

posts.title: SEO Best Practices
posts.content: Search Engine Optimization is crucial for web visibility. Focus on quality content, proper meta tags, and responsive design to improve rankings.
posts.author: Mike Johnson

posts.title: Modern Frontend Development
posts.content: The frontend landscape is constantly evolving. Stay updated with the latest tools, frameworks, and best practices to build amazing user experiences.
posts.author: Sarah Williams
